channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Useful Banner Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Useful Banner Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-1694|2024-08-03T00:10:03.759Z -- unknown -- useful%20banner%20manager
item.description: The Useful Banner Manager WordPress plugin through 1.6.1 does not perform CSRF checks on POST requests to its admin page, allowing an attacker to trick a logged in admin to add, modify or delete banners from the plugin by submitting a form.
